name: Travel Daddy
overview:
Travel daddy Corp is a web solutions enterprise based in NJ, United states with a focus on Travel.

Their site www.traveldaddy.com is an extensive portal catering to needs of all traveling enthusiasts around the world. Traveldaddy.com makes it easier for the users to find a travel buddy to a destination along with plethora of other services. The site will also help the users maintain their travel journalâ€™s and photos, along with comprehensive data about all major destinations around the world.

Aim of the site is to address travel related worries and help seekers find the perfect travel partner. One can find travel partners from amongst the huge traveldaddy member community who are also looking for a travel buddy or invite existing friends to join on a trip.

Along with finding travel buddies to destinations, member can also find commute and flight buddies. Incase one does not want to send their children or grandparents alone in a flight to a far away place, travel daddy can be a helpful resource. Members can upload Travel pictures, update daily travel journal and communicate easily with other members as well as friends an family while on the go.

The site also provides as a comprehensive research platform for destinations one might want to travel to, with member generated reviews, tips and events. You can find destination tips, hotel reviews, discounted travel packages, all at a single place.

In a short while Travel daddy will be launching a huge travel partner interface, which will help tour operators, travel agents and hotels to advertise attractive deals to the members and thus provide with more choices to the Users.
